task.title: Managing Tax Default Settings
task.abstract: System Admins must set organization wide defaults to ensure taxes are consistently applied in the same manner to items within the organization.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Spark Admin tab in the Spark Framework app and click Apps.
Click the Charge menu item and then click on eBusiness User/Profile Preferences.
Check the Calculate Sales Tax checkbox to enable taxes on items.
Enter the Tax Account and Tax Locale .
Click Update Organization Wide Default Preferences.

taskbody.result: Tax calculations are enabled for the organization.
